description: Visual Learning and Embodied Agents in Simulation Environments at ECCV 2018.
ShapeNet received the Symposium on Geometry Processing (SGP) dataset award.
Invited talk at RSS 2018 workshop on New Benchmarks, Metrics, and Competitions for Robotic Learning.
ScanNet v2 release and ScanNet Benchmark challenge announced.
Co-organizing ECCV 2018 workshop on Visual Learning and Embodied Agents in Simulation Environments.
I was awarded the TUM-IAS Hans Fischer Fellowship.
